This is a community-supported SSVEP measure and aperiod analysis for EEG or other time series signal. If you'd like to contribute, check out our GitHub repository. Your contributions are welcome!

Classes#

FBCCA

Class for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) methods.

Module Contents#

class scut_ssvep_aperiod.ssvep_method.fbcca.FBCCA(sfreq, ws, fres_list, n_harmonics, Nc=9, Nm=5, passband=[6, 14, 22, 30, 38], stopband=[4, 10, 16, 24, 32], high_cut_pass=40, high_cut_stop=50)[source]#

Bases: scut_ssvep_aperiod.ssvep_method.ssvep_methd_base.CCABase

Class for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) methods.

Inherits from SSVEPMethodBase and adds harmonic analysis capabilities.

n_harmonics[source]#

Number of harmonics to consider for reference signals.

Type:

int

calculate_ex()[source]#

Returns the results of the classification experiments.

The results of the classification experiments.

Return type:

ndarray

classify(test_data)[source]#

Classifies the test data using FBCCA.

Parameters:

test_data (ndarray) – Input test data with shape (n_epochs, n_channels, n_times).

Returns:

An array of predicted class labels for each segment.

Return type:

ndarray

filter_bank(eeg)[source]#

Applies a filter bank to the EEG data.

Parameters:

eeg (ndarray) – Input EEG data with shape (n_epoch, n_channels, n_times).

Returns:

Filtered data with shape (n_epoch, Nm, n_channels, n_times).

Return type:

ndarray
